榸字的基本解释

榸
zhāi
枯木根。

榸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhāi］
［《廣韻》卓皆切，平皆，知。］
枯木根。

榸字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榸； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页545第04
【唐韻】卓皆切【集韻】樁皆切，?音?。枯木根。出【聲類】。　又【六書故】樁，俗又曰榸。聲之轉也。【正字通】榸、樁音別義同。

榸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
榸字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhāi］
["Guang Yun" Zhuo is all cut, plain is all, knowing. ]
Withered roots.
Hun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榸; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 545 04
[Tang Yun] Zhuo Jiyun is cut [Ji Yun] The piles are cut, "Yin". Withered roots. Out [sound class].　[Six Books and Gu] piles, the vulgar is called 榸. The voice of the turn also. [Zhengzitong] 榸 and pile sounds have the same meaning.
